languages.text: "Я достаточно умна, чтобы не гнуть спину на жиреющих имперских чинуш, и в меру свята, чтобы распознать, где свет Императора, а где золото иконных рам. И довольно о том, милейший".
"I'm clever enough not to toil for Imperial clerks who grow fatter by the day, and pious enough to tell the Emperor's light from the gold of an icon's frame. I say we leave it at that, my good man."
languages.original_text: "Я достаточно умна, чтобы не гнуть спину на жиреющих имперских чинуш, и в меру свята, чтобы распознать, где свет Императора, а где золото иконных рам. И довольно о том, милейший".

traits.locale_text: "I'm clever enough not to toil for Imperial clerks who grow fatter by the day, and pious enough to tell the Emperor's light from the gold of an icon's frame. I say we leave it at that, my good man."

"I'm clever enough not to toil for Imperial clerks who grow fatter by the day, and pious enough to tell the Emperor's light from the gold of an icon's frame. I say we leave it at that, my good man."

languages.text: “我确实很聪明，不会为那些尸位素餐的帝国文员工作。而且我也确实很虔诚，我看得出来哪些是帝皇真正的光芒，哪些只是神像发出来的金光。我说，这个话题就到此为止吧，好朋友。”
languages.original_text: "I'm clever enough not to toil for Imperial clerks who grow fatter by the day, and pious enough to tell the Emperor's light from the gold of an icon's frame. I say we leave it at that, my good man."

traits.locale_text: “我确实很聪明，不会为那些尸位素餐的帝国文员工作。而且我也确实很虔诚，我看得出来哪些是帝皇真正的光芒，哪些只是神像发出来的金光。我说，这个话题就到此为止吧，好朋友。”

languages.text: «Soy lo suficientemente astuta como para no sacrificarme por agentes imperiales que engordan día a día, y lo bastante piadosa como para distinguir la luz del Emperador del oro del marco de un icono. Dejémoslo así, buen hombre».
languages.original_text: "I'm clever enough not to toil for Imperial clerks who grow fatter by the day, and pious enough to tell the Emperor's light from the gold of an icon's frame. I say we leave it at that, my good man."

traits.locale_text: «Soy lo suficientemente astuta como para no sacrificarme por agentes imperiales que engordan día a día, y lo bastante piadosa como para distinguir la luz del Emperador del oro del marco de un icono. Dejémoslo así, buen hombre».

languages.text: 「ぶくぶくと肥え続ける帝国職員のために働かないだけの賢さと、皇帝の旗印の枠の金色を見分けるだけの敬虔さは持っているわ。それだけよ」
languages.original_text: "I'm clever enough not to toil for Imperial clerks who grow fatter by the day, and pious enough to tell the Emperor's light from the gold of an icon's frame. I say we leave it at that, my good man."

traits.locale_text: 「ぶくぶくと肥え続ける帝国職員のために働かないだけの賢さと、皇帝の旗印の枠の金色を見分けるだけの敬虔さは持っているわ。それだけよ」

languages.text: "Ich bin klug genug, um nicht für imperiale Beamte zu schiften, die täglich fetter werden, und fromm genug, um das Licht des Imperators von der Goldschicht auf einem Ikonenrahmen zu unterscheiden. Lassen wir es dabei bewenden, guter Mann."
languages.original_text: "I'm clever enough not to toil for Imperial clerks who grow fatter by the day, and pious enough to tell the Emperor's light from the gold of an icon's frame. I say we leave it at that, my good man."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin klug genug, um nicht für imperiale Beamte zu schiften, die täglich fetter werden, und fromm genug, um das Licht des Imperators von der Goldschicht auf einem Ikonenrahmen zu unterscheiden. Lassen wir es dabei bewenden, guter Mann."

languages.text: « Je suis suffisamment maligne pour ne pas trimer pour des agents impériaux qui s'engraissent chaque jour un peu plus, et suffisamment pieuse pour savoir faire la différence entre la lumière de l'Empereur et l'or du cadre d'une icône. Je suggère que nous en restions là, mon bon vieillard. »
languages.original_text: "I'm clever enough not to toil for Imperial clerks who grow fatter by the day, and pious enough to tell the Emperor's light from the gold of an icon's frame. I say we leave it at that, my good man."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis suffisamment maligne pour ne pas trimer pour des agents impériaux qui s'engraissent chaque jour un peu plus, et suffisamment pieuse pour savoir faire la différence entre la lumière de l'Empereur et l'or du cadre d'une icône. Je suggère que nous en restions là, mon bon vieillard. »

languages.text: "Günbegün daha da şişmanlayan İmparatorluk kâtipleri için çalışmayacak kadar akıllı, İmparator'un ışığı ile bir tablonun çerçevesindeki altını birbirine karıştırmayacak kadar inançlıyım. Sen iyi yürekli bir adamsın, bence bu konuyu burada kapatalım."
languages.original_text: "I'm clever enough not to toil for Imperial clerks who grow fatter by the day, and pious enough to tell the Emperor's light from the gold of an icon's frame. I say we leave it at that, my good man."

traits.locale_text: "Günbegün daha da şişmanlayan İmparatorluk kâtipleri için çalışmayacak kadar akıllı, İmparator'un ışığı ile bir tablonun çerçevesindeki altını birbirine karıştırmayacak kadar inançlıyım. Sen iyi yürekli bir adamsın, bence bu konuyu burada kapatalım."
